TERMS OF USE

ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS

1. By fact of downloading, installing and using this application, you unconditionally agree to the terms of use. The developers of this software do not bear any responsibility for direct or indirect losses, potentially caused during this application usage.

2. The application is provided "as is". Developers have the right to change, amend, update the text of the user's agreement without prior notice. The current and most complete version of this agreement can be found at: wi-fi-key.com

TERMINOLOGY

Hotspot (access point, Wi-fi point) - a wireless base station for providing wireless access to an existing network (wireless or wired) or create a new wireless network.

SOFTWARE

1. This software is used solely for distribution publicly available information or the one which can be considered as such, about the parameters to connect to Wi-fi networks.

2. When using the software, you can distribute information about the access point if:

a) it is under your full control and you consciously want to share information about it; 

b) it is in a public place where it is publicly available information; 

c) you do know that the owner of Wi-fi point shares information with previously undefined circle of third parties, which, in their's turn, do not undertake to keep this information secret and, as a consequence, can distribute it by any available means(electronic or printed);

d) you are a person who has been entrusted with the information needed to connect to a particular Wi-fi point and you didn't take any responsibility as to not disclosing such information by any means available to you orally or in written form. 

In all these cases, the responsibility for information distribution is on the owner of the Wi-fi point.

DISCLAIMER

The developers of this software are not liable for the actions of someone who shares information about Wi-fi point. Responsibility for the execution of all the items in the previous section lies entirely on users of the software

Thank you for choosing software of our development.
